Text: God, redemption comes to us through You, and Your adoption [t] of us is guaranteed. We are Your children. Look with tenderness upon all the children of Your love. [*] Give true freedom and eternal life to all who believe in Your Son. Through Jesus Christ.
Changes: 2023-09-02 - Paul Prins: Fixed casing on divine pronouns.
2022-06-16 - Paul Prins: First translation of this prayer.
